sentences.sentence: The Atman and so on, they are just theories.
sentences.translation: 有灵魂存在，但那只是理论而已。

sentences.sentence: The object of experience exists only to serve the purpose of the Atman.
sentences.translation: 经验的对象仅仅为服务于阿特漫的目的而存在。

sentences.sentence: Ignorance is destroyed by awakening to knowledge of the Atman, until no trace of illusion remains.
sentences.translation: 摧毁无明的方法是唤醒阿特曼的认识，直到没有幻相残留。
